name: Sigiriya Rock Fortress Tour
summary: Explore the ancient Sigiriya Rock Fortress in Sri Lanka.
description: Join our expert guides on a two-day adventure to the majestic Sigiriya Rock Fortress. This tour includes a visit to the stunning ancient city and breathtaking views from the top of the rock.

name: Kandy Heritage Tour
summary: Discover the cultural heritage of Kandy, Sri Lanka's hill capital.
description: This three-day tour takes you through the cultural landmarks of Kandy, including the Temple of the Tooth, Royal Botanical Gardens, and a scenic hike to Knuckles Mountain Range.

name: Galle Fort and Beaches Tour
summary: Relax and explore the historic Galle Fort and stunning beaches.
description: This two-day tour combines history and relaxation with visits to Galle Fort, Unawatuna Beach, and a boat safari on the Madu River.

name: Ella Adventure Tour
summary: Embark on an adventurous journey in Ella.
description: This four-day tour includes trekking in Ella, exploring the Nine Arches Bridge, Little Adam's Peak, and a visit to the Ravana Falls.

name: Colombo City and Nightlife Tour
summary: Experience the vibrant city life and nightlife of Colombo.
description: A one-day tour of Colombo that includes a city tour, a visit to Gangaramaya Temple, shopping at Pettah Market, and an evening at the popular nightlife spots.

name: Anuradhapura Ancient Ruins Tour
summary: Explore the ancient ruins of Anuradhapura, one of Sri Lanka's oldest cities.
description: This two-day tour includes guided visits to the sacred city of Anuradhapura, Mihintale, and the ancient temples and stupas that mark this historic site.

name: Nuwara Eliya Tea and Waterfalls Tour
summary: Discover the lush tea plantations and stunning waterfalls of Nuwara Eliya.
description: This three-day tour covers visits to tea plantations, Horton Plains National Park, and the famous waterfalls of Nuwara Eliya, known as Little England.

name: Yala National Park Safari
summary: Experience the wildlife of Yala National Park on this thrilling safari.
description: This two-day safari tour takes you deep into Yala National Park, home to elephants, leopards, and a wide variety of birds and other wildlife.

name: Trincomalee Beaches and Marine Life Tour
summary: Relax on the beautiful beaches of Trincomalee and explore the rich marine life.
description: This three-day tour includes beach time at Nilaveli and Uppuveli, and a visit to Pigeon Island National Park for snorkeling and marine exploration.

name: Polonnaruwa Kingdom Tour
summary: Step back in time to explore the ancient kingdom of Polonnaruwa.
description: This two-day tour includes guided visits to the ancient ruins of Polonnaruwa, Gal Viharaya, and a cycling tour around the old city.
